title: Never Trust a Dragon
description: "It's not that I want to kill those people; I'm not a monster. I'm just not that dramatic about them dying in case it's necessary for my plans."King Sorin the Great, The First of His NameFar away, in a remote corner of the empire, King Sorin is the charismatic yet deeply flawed king of Aragonia. He is about to perform the first step in his grand plan to dethrone the emperor and take his place when everything around him begins to fall apart.Nevertheless, Sorin is determined to overcome the obstacles and fulfill his plan (without compromising his afternoon nap routine). He is dragged through a series of hilarious twists and turns while sharing his unique perspective of the events and the useless people surrounding his greatness with the readers.In a realm where chaos meets comedy, "Never Trust a Dragon" invites you on a wild, funny, unpredictable journey. If you love laughing out loud, enjoy surprising plots, and tend to trust dragons, this is the right book for you.
author: Eviatar Avni
